item.description:
Hi Folks,

Am thinking of Heading to the Naked Oyster again for Happy Hour and wanted to see if anyone wanted to Join me. I usually go on Saturdays and they have their Happy hour from 4-7 PM. They have more food other than Oysters too. Burgers, Salads, Steak and a Vodka bar with I was told over 100 Vodkas but I love seafood.

I love Oysters and for $1 you can't go wrong. Plenty of Parking the in the Area too. They are located at 200 Crown Street, New Haven.

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Oysters & Martini's Night $1 Oysters & $6 Martini's
